<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shockguard Coil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1137)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 83</row>

**Price** 175 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) a foe's melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack or melee attack with the affixed shield.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This miniature Stasian coil talisman emits small sparks when jostled. It uses a combination of Stasian technology and evocation magic to erupt in electricity when discharged. When you activate the coil, the foe takes 2d12 electricity damage (DC 27 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a failed save, the foe is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of its next turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Shockguard Coil
